title.bibl: Illinois Staats-Zeitung, Jan. 31, 1901. Alschuler Forms Partnership with Adolph Kraus

div.bibl: Illinois Staats-Zeitung, Jan. 31, 1901. ALSCHULER FORMS PARTNERSHIP WITH ADOLPH KRAUS

body.p: Samuel Alschuler, Democratic candidate for governor during the last campaign, will be associated with the law firm of Kraus and Holden, at the Unity Building. The change will take effect on February 14, and thereafter the firm will be known as Kraus, Alschuler and Holden. Heretofore Mr. Alschuler practiced in Aurora. He was a member of the State Legislature for four years.
